column4: hi all. i have 5.04 cd and dont have a speedy internet connection. if i install the 5.04 can i upgrade it to 6.06 ? is it easy?
may be better to go to the local bookstore and see if they got ubuntu included with a linux magazine. :P and reinstall dapper.
upgrading to dapper.. will download  quite a bit of stuff.
how much mbs :) is it over 300-400 ?
